figure.head: Figure
shows
figure.figDesc:
the average annual change in below upper secondary and tertiary attainment rates, and the difference
between them, for the period 2000-2013. Countries exhibit very different patterns of educational expansion.

figure.head: Figure
shows
figure.figDesc:
the overall distribution of literacy skills among 25-64 year-olds as measured in the OECD Survey of Adult
Skills (PIAAC). It shows that, in all national and sub-national entities participating in the survey, the distance between
the median and the 10th percentile is greater than between the median and the 90th percentile. In all entities the
distribution is skewed towards the bottom.
